article_title: Holocaust survivor Samuel Goetz ensured Nazi horrors were told
article_text:
Samuel Goetz, a Holocaust survivor, made it his mission in the U.S. to publicize the Nazis' atrocities after the emergence of revisionist and denial literature in the 1970s.

Mr. Goetz, who died at age 85 of pancreatic cancer at his home in Los Angeles on Oct. 24, proposed that the University of California, Los Angeles establish a chair of...
